meanings.definition: A single layer of molecules or atoms on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the monolayer of molecules under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The monolayer of atoms formed a protective barrier on the metal surface.
meanings.sent3: The monolayer of molecules threw a tiny party on the surface.
meanings.sent4: The monolayer of atoms stood like a silent guard on the surface.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering monolayer of molecules sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A thin layer of cells that covers a surface.
meanings.sent1: The monolayer of cells formed a delicate film on the petri dish.
meanings.sent2: A monolayer of skin cells protects our body from external threats.
meanings.sent3: The monolayer of cells decided to have a picnic on the surface.
meanings.sent4: The monolayer of cells acted like a shield against harmful substances.
meanings.sent5: The transparent monolayer of cells resembled a thin veil over the surface.
